name: Attack
desc: Make a weapon attack against a target within range.

name: Power Attack
desc: Make a weapon attack with advantage. On hit, deal +2 damage.

name: Sweep Attack
desc: Make a weapon attack against up to two adjacent targets within range.

name: Extend Attack
desc: Make a weapon attack with +1 range. Works only with weapons that have the Extend property.

name: Parry
desc: When an enemy attacks you, increase your PD by 2 against that attack.

name: Disarm
desc: Make a contested Martial check. On success, the target drops one held item.

name: Grapple
desc: Make a contested Martial check. On success, the target is grappled (Speed 0).

name: Shove
desc: Make a contested Martial check. On success, push the target 1 space.

name: Defensive Stance
desc: Until the start of your next turn, gain +2 to PD and AD.
